hero.title: The AI Crossroads
hero.subtitle: Connect, create, and extend your AI capabilities with a unified platform. Build and manage plugins that enhance your AI workflows.
hero.headline: Connect, Share, and Discover MCP Servers
hero.subheadline: The community hub and universal proxy for the Machine Conversation Protocol
hero.analogy: "One MCP proxy to rule all MCPs"

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your MCP servers
features.sectionSubtitle: Everything you need to connect, share, and discover MCP servers effectively.

communitySharing.title: Community MCP Server Sharing
communitySharing.description: Share your MCP servers and discover creations from the community.

collectionManagement.title: Collection Management
collectionManagement.description: Organize servers into collections for different clients or projects.

workspaceOrganization.title: Workspace Organization
workspaceOrganization.description: Group collections into workspaces like development or production.

advancedSearch.title: Advanced Search
advancedSearch.description: Find the perfect MCP server with powerful filtering capabilities.

mcpPlayground.title: MCP Playground
mcpPlayground.description: Test and debug your MCP servers in an interactive environment.

pluginManagement.title: Plugin Management
pluginManagement.description: Browse, configure, and manage MCP servers and plugins
pluginManagement.content: Connect various AI tools and services through a unified interface. Configure and manage your plugins from a central dashboard.

aiPlayground.title: AI Playground
aiPlayground.description: Test and experiment with your AI tools in an interactive environment
aiPlayground.content: Experience your plugins in action. The playground allows you to test different configurations and see real-time results.

customDevelopment.title: Custom Development
customDevelopment.description: Create and customize your own MCP servers and tools
customDevelopment.benefit1: Discover innovative servers from fellow developers.
customDevelopment.benefit2: Get feedback and ratings on your shared servers.
customDevelopment.benefit3: Collaborate and build upon community creations.
customDevelopment.benefit4: Stay updated with the latest MCP trends.
customDevelopment.content: Build custom capabilities using our Python editor and integrated development environment. Extend your AI with specialized functionalities.

langchainAbstraction.title: Test Any Model: Langchain Abstraction
langchainAbstraction.description: Plugged.in uses the Langchain abstraction layer so you can test your MCP servers with Claude, GPT, Llama, and moreâ€”all from a single interface. Instantly compare models, future-proof your workflow, and experience true model-agnostic AI.

community.title: Join the MCP Community
community.subtitle: Join the growing community of MCP developers
community.description: Share your MCP servers, discover powerful tools built by others, and collaborate within a growing ecosystem. Rate servers, leave reviews, and find the best solutions for your needs.
community.benefit1: Discover innovative servers from fellow developers.
community.benefit2: Get feedback and ratings on your shared servers.
community.benefit3: Collaborate and build upon community creations.
community.benefit4: Stay updated with the latest MCP trends.

testimonials.title: What Developers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from the community
testimonials.sectionSubtitle: Hear what our users have to say about Plugged.in.
testimonials.quote1: "Plugged.in revolutionized how our team manages MCP servers. The organization features are fantastic!"
testimonials.quote2: "The community sharing aspect is a game-changer. Discovering new tools is easier than ever."
testimonials.quote3: "Debugging with the MCP Playground saved us countless hours. Highly recommended!"

search.title: Find the Right Tools, Instantly
search.subtitle: Discover MCP servers and tools with powerful search and filtering options.
search.description: Search through the growing collection of MCP servers and tools.
search.imagePlaceholder: Image: Search results showing community servers (CardGrid Mockup)
search.feature1Desc: Quickly find servers by name, description, or capabilities using our smart search algorithm.
search.feature2Desc: Narrow down results with filters for categories, tags, ratings, and compatibility.
search.feature3Desc: View server details, ratings, and community reviews directly from the search results.

playground.title: Test & Debug with MCP Playground
playground.subtitle: An interactive environment to build, test, and refine your MCP servers.
playground.feature1Desc: Directly interact with your MCP servers, call tools, and inspect resources in real-time.
playground.feature2Desc: Identify and resolve issues quickly with detailed request/response logs and error messages.
playground.feature3Desc: Experiment with different server configurations and tool implementations before deployment.

collections.title: Organize Your MCP Ecosystem
collections.subtitle: Organize your tools
collections.description: Create and share collections of your favorite MCP servers and tools.
collections.collectionsDesc: Group related MCP servers into logical collections for specific clients, applications, or environments.
collections.workspacesDesc: Organize your collections further into workspaces, such as separating development, staging, and production setups.

sharing.title: Community Sharing
sharing.subtitle: Share with others
sharing.description: Share your MCP servers and tools with the community.

gettingStarted.title: New to Plugged.in?
gettingStarted.description: Follow our setup guide to get your environment configured properly and start building with Plugged.in right away.

cta.title: Ready to Supercharge Your MCP Workflow?
